EmailTemplate.name: HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION.Invite #4 Non-Registrants (Sneak peek in
EmailTemplate.subject: Sneak peek into the discussion at Forum 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly: July 18 – 19, 2023 | Boston, MA With a full speaker roster <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/speakers?&utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content=&utm_term=&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION&utm_campaign_id=ME4b/]]> of healthcare leaders under our belt, we’ve been busy shaping the sessions that will make Forum an inspiring experience. Here are a few topics you can expect to explore: - Hybrid care driving value-based outcomes for chronic conditions - Engaging diverse populations to advance health equity - The power of virtual nursing to mitigate urgent workforce challenges Dive into the topics you care about with a community of like-minded change-makers who are transforming the future of virtual care. Stay tuned for the reveal of our agenda coming later this month. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
